intro_only_event_multi_aprilfool_intro_2:
Hoopa thought it’d be real funny to transport a
bunch of Ditto to Pasio and have ’em transform
into Trainers!

As you can see, it’s thrown the whole island
into chaos...

There’s a prime example—not one but TWO
living legends standing right before our eyes!

Ditto can’t speak our language, so you’d think
it’d be easy to tell them apart, but Red’s not
much of a talker, either...
Argh! Which one is the real Red?!

Heh. Isn’t it obvious? I think you might be losing
your touch, Mr. International Police investigator!

The fake wasn’t giving off any of Red’s usual
“battle me right here, right now” vibes!
That was plenty enough evidence for me.

I see... You’ve battled each other countless times
as rivals! That’s how you were able to suss him
out so quickly!

[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I think I know how to
solve this mess, but I’m going to need your help!
